name: WP Faucet Direct
author: Jose Sinisterra

sections.description:
To use WP Faucet Direct you need to create an account at Block.io * (registration is free)

Once you have created the account you will get your Key API and PIN of the currency you select, necessary for you to enter in the configuration panel of WP Faucet Direct

This plugin supports Bitcoin, Litecoin and Dogecoin which are the same currencies that Block.io supports

With WP Faucet Direct you can create your direct payment faucet in a simple way in your WordPress page by simply adding a shortcode in the section of the page where you want it to appear

Full plugin features here: seoland.es/plugin-faucet-direct
sections.installation:
For an automatic installation through WordPress:

  1. Go to the \’Add New\’ plugins screen in your WordPress admin area
  2. Search for \’WP Faucet Direct\’
  3. Click \’Install Now\’ and activate the plugin

For a manual installation via FTP:

  1. Upload the \’wp-faucet-direct\’ directory to the \’/wp-content/plugins/\’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in your WordPress admin area

To upload the plugin through WordPress, instead of FTP:

  1. Upload the downloaded zip file on the \’Add New\’ plugins screen (see the \’Upload\’ tab) in your WordPress admin area and activate.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in your WordPress admin area
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

For an automatic installation through WordPress:

  1. Go to the \’Add New\’ plugins screen in your WordPress admin area
  2. Search for \’WP Faucet Direct\’
  3. Click \’Install Now\’ and activate the plugin

For a manual installation via FTP:

  1. Upload the \’wp-faucet-direct\’ directory to the \’/wp-content/plugins/\’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in your WordPress admin area

To upload the plugin through WordPress, instead of FTP:

  1. Upload the downloaded zip file on the \’Add New\’ plugins screen (see the \’Upload\’ tab) in your WordPress admin area and activate.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in your WordPress admin area

For Support

For support seoland.es/soporte

Once you have created the account you will get your Key API and PIN of the currency you select, necessary for you to enter in the configuration panel of WP Faucet Direct

This plugin supports Bitcoin, Litecoin and Dogecoin which are the same currencies that Block.io supports

upgrade_notice:
Upgrade your WP Faucet Direct to PRO plugin Features:

  • Multifaucet, you can offer 3 different currencies in each section of your faucet or page
  • Direct payments to the wallets of the users of the faucet
  • Instant direct payments or by accumulation of the amount that you establish
  • Payments can be set from your panel manually or automatically
  • Check the wallet addresses that make requests in your faucet
  • Check the IPs that make requests in your faucet
  • Consult the total accumulated for each wallet, the number of times that I request coins and since IP or IP\'s
  • Filters: You can easily consult the address of a wallet, or the IP, everything related to requests, accumulated IPs of requests, hours of complaint, etc.
  • You can easily delete a wallet or a certain request for coins
